flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
name: Majordomo Executus
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
